Sentencas: In this paper we report the successful incorporation of silicon into Sr1-yCayFeO3-delta perovskite materials for potential applications as electrode materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells.
Titulo: Investigation into the effect of Si doping on the cell symmetry and performance of Sr1-yCayFeO3-δ SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: It is observed that Si doping leads to a change from a tetragonal or orthorhombic structure (with partial ordering of oxygen vacancies) to a cubic one (with the oxygen vacancies disordered).
Titulo: Investigation into the effect of Si doping on the cell symmetry and performance of Sr1-yCayFeO3-δ SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: The structures of the phases, SrFe0.85Si0.15O3-delta, Sr0.75Ca0.25Fe0.85Si0.15O3-delta and Sr0.5Ca0.5Fe0.85Si0.15O3-delta, were analysed using neutron powder diffraction.
Titulo: Investigation into the effect of Si doping on the cell symmetry and performance of Sr1-yCayFeO3-δ SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: The data confirmed the cubic unit cell, with no long range oxygen vacancy ordering.
Titulo: Investigation into the effect of Si doping on the cell symmetry and performance of Sr1-yCayFeO3-δ SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: Conductivity measurements showed an improvement in the conductivity on Si doping, especially for samples with high Ca content.
Titulo: Investigation into the effect of Si doping on the cell symmetry and performance of Sr1-yCayFeO3-δ SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: Composite electrodes comprising 50% Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 and 50% Sr1-yCay(Fe/Si)O3-delta on dense Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 pellets were therefore examined in air.
Titulo: Investigation into the effect of Si doping on the cell symmetry and performance of Sr1-yCayFeO3-δ SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: An improvement in the area specific resistances (ASR) values is observed for the Si-doped samples with respect to the undoped samples.
Titulo: Investigation into the effect of Si doping on the cell symmetry and performance of Sr1-yCayFeO3-δ SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: Thus the results show that silicon can be incorporated into Sr1-yCayFeO3-delta-based materials and can have a beneficial effect on the performance, making them potentially suitable for use as cathode material in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Investigation into the effect of Si doping on the cell symmetry and performance of Sr1-yCayFeO3-δ SOFC cathode materials
